summary: 2003 CADILLAC DEVILLE FUEL SYSTEM PROBLEM CAUSED THE ENGINE TO STOP RUNNING TWICE  ONCE AT APROX 35 MILES PER HOUR, AND AGAIN AT 50 MILES PER HOUR.THE SECOND TIME  WAS AFTER THE DEALER HAD TAKEN THE CAR TO FIX AND RETURNED IT TELLING US THE PROBLEM  WAS FIXED AND WAS SAFE TO DRIVE.THE NEXT DAY IT STOPPED AGAIN. THIS TIME THE DEALER HAD THE CAR 28 DAYS.
